DESCRIPTION: Motus database ID for the tag record.
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: Motus ID de base de données pour l'enregistrement de l'émetteur.

DESCRIPTION: The ID of the project that manages this tag.
Period (e.g. year and quarter) when the tag was registered (e.g. 2015-2).
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: Période (par exemple année et trimestre) lorsque l'étiquette a été enregistrée (par exemple 2015-2).

DESCRIPTION: ID printed on the tag, used to filter the results (i.e. search if a specific combination of project and mfgID already exists).
Tag repeat period (in seconds). This value is measured from the sample recording of the tag.
Database ID for the tag deployment record.
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: ID de base de données pour l'enregistrement de déploiement de l'émetteur.

DESCRIPTION: Start year in UTC
Start month in UTC
Start day in UTC
Start hour in UTC
Start minute in UTC
End year in UTC
End month in UTC
End day in UTC
End hour in UTC
End minute in UTC
Defer time (in seconds from start time). Some tags are capable of deferred activation - they don't start transmitting until some number of seconds (can be very large) after activation.
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: Différer temps (en secondes de temps de démarrage). Certains émetteurs sont capables d'activation différée - ils ne commencent pas à transmettre jusqu'à un certain nombre de secondes (peut être très grand) après l'activation.

DESCRIPTION: Species name (Scientific, English, or French) of the species on which the tag is being deployed
Unique band number
Marker number, other than the tag eg. metal band number)
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: Numéro de marqueur, autre que l'émetteur (par exemple le numéro de bande de métal).

DESCRIPTION: Type of marker (e.g. metal band).
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: Type de marqueur (par exemple bande métallique).

Timestamp; GMT, precision: 0.1 ms (SG); 2.5 ms (Lotek). To convert a TS to Date in R: Install Pagacked “lubridate” and run require(lubridate) Sys.setenv(TZ='GMT')data$ts <- as_datetime(data$ts, tz = "UTC")) To convert in excel use =(((ts/60)/60)/24)+DATE(1970,1,1)
Latitude from GPS location at time of writing the hourly file
Longitude from GPS  location at time of writing the hourly file
Altitude from GPS
Unique identifier for a receiver, which is possibly shared within several projects (e.g. 110). Each deviceID normally corresponds to a single receiverID (serial number)
The ID of the project that manages this reciever
Numeric Motus receiver ID - unique to each receiver in the system
Numeric Motus receiver deployment ID - unique to each deployment
Serial number of the receiver.
Deployment latitude in decimal degrees - negative values for Southern hemisphere
Deployment longitude in decimal degrees - negative values for Western hemisphere
Numeric Motus receiver ID - unique to each receiver in the system
The ID of the project that manages this reciever
Serial number of the receiver.
Numeric Motus receiver deployment ID - unique to each deployment
USB Hub port the sensor is attached to; 0 means directly attached; -1 means not USB
Antenna Type eg. 9-element Yagi, Omni directional
Compass direction antenna axis is pointing at (degrees clockwise from magnetic North 0-360°)
Tilt of antenna axis, in degrees above (positive) or below (negative) horizontal
Antenna polarization (bearing 0-360º)
Tilt of antenna polarization, in degrees above (positive) or below (negative) horizontal
Height in meters
type of filter attached. "VHF-BPF" or "other" for now
Length of coax cable (m) connecting antenna to funcubedongle radio (optional).
Type of coax cable connecting antenna to funcubedongle radio (optional).
Distance of antenna axis centre from SensorGnome GPS, in metres
Bearing of antenna axis from SensorGnome GPS (degrees clockwise from magnetic north: 0-360)°
Antenna details
The elevation angle is the angle between the horizontal plane and the line of sight, measured in the vertical plane.
Antenna polarization
Antenna polarization

Status of deployment: pending-indicates that the deployment record isn’t ready to be finalized for deployment yet. deploy-indicates that the deployment can be activated. Terminate-will attempt to finalize a deployment by providing an end date
Numeric Motus receiver ID - unique to each receiver in the system
The ID of the project that manages this reciever
Serial number of the receiver.
Type of receiver (e.g. Sensor Gnome).
Unique identifier for a receiver, which is possibly shared within several projects (e.g. 110). Each deviceID normally corresponds to a single receiverID (serial number)
Numeric Motus receiver deployment ID - unique to each deployment

Status of deployment: pending-indicates that the deployment record isn’t ready to be finalized for deployment yet. deploy-indicates that the deployment can be activated. Terminate-will attempt to finalize a deployment by providing an end date
Label assigned by the project manager (e.g. location name). This field is optional, and the same label can be used for multiple deployments.
Deployment end date
Deployment start date

Timestamp for start. To convert a TS to Date in R: Install Pagacked “lubridate” and run require(lubridate) Sys.setenv(TZ='GMT')data$ts <- as_datetime(data$ts, tz = "UTC")) To convert in excel use =(((ts/60)/60)/24)+DATE(1970,1,1)

Timestamp for end. To convert a TS to Date in R: Install Pagacked “lubridate” and run require(lubridate) Sys.setenv(TZ='GMT')data$ts <- as_datetime(data$ts, tz = "UTC")) To convert in excel use =(((ts/60)/60)/24)+DATE(1970,1,1)
Type of fixture (e.g. tower, existing, etc.)
Latitude in decimal degrees - negative values for Southern hemisphere
Longitude in decimal degrees - negative values for Western hemisphere
Elevation above sea level (meters)
True or False, whether the sensor is deployed on a mobile platform (eg. a ship)
MAC Address of the receiver.

Timestamp; GMT, precision: 0.1 ms (SG); 2.5 ms (Lotek). To convert a TS to Date in R: Install Pagacked “lubridate” and run require(lubridate) Sys.setenv(TZ='GMT')data$ts <- as_datetime(data$ts, tz = "UTC")) To convert in excel use =(((ts/60)/60)/24)+DATE(1970,1,1)
Signal strength in "native units"; for SG: dBmax (logarithmic, 0 = max possible, -10 = 0.1 * max, etc.); for Lotek: 0...255
Standard deviation in signal strength among pulses in this burst.  SG only
Estimate of background radio noise when tag detected, in dBmax; SG only.
frequency offset from antenna frequency, in kHz;  SG only.  Tags often transmit on a frequency several kHz off the nominal one.
Standard deviation of freq among pulses in this burst, in kHz; SG only (NA for Lotek receivers).  Values larger than 0.1 kHz suggest a bogus detection.
Total discrepancy between inter-pulse intervals for this burst, in milliseconds; SG only.
Discrepancy between registered and observed burst intervals, in seconds.  This is always 0 for the first burst in a run (see posInRun)
Unique identifier for a receiver, which is possibly shared within several projects (e.g. 110). Each deviceID normally corresponds to a single receiverID (serial number)
Serial number of the receiver.
Numeric Motus receiver ID - unique to each receiver in the system
The ID of the project that manages this reciever
Numeric Motus receiver deployment ID - unique to each deployment
Unique identifier for a run of tags
Number of tag bursts in the current run; constant for all records having the same runID
Antenna code (for sensorgnomes, USB port number; for Lotek, whatever they use, usually numeric, but can be e.g. AH0)
Motus tag ID - unique to each individual tag registered
ID printed on the tag, used to filter the results (i.e. search if a specific combination of project and mfgID already exists).
Period (e.g. year and quarter) when the tag was registered (e.g. 2015-2).
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: Période (par exemple année et trimestre) lorsque l'étiquette a été enregistrée (par exemple 2015-2).

DESCRIPTION: The ID of the project that manages this tag.
Database ID for the tag deployment record.
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: ID de base de données pour l'enregistrement de déploiement de l'émetteur.

DESCRIPTION: Motus database ID for the tag record.
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: Motus ID de base de données pour l'enregistrement de l'émetteur.

DESCRIPTION: The ID of the project that manages this tag.
ID printed on the tag, used to filter the results (i.e. search if a specific combination of project and mfgID already exists).
Period (e.g. year and quarter) when the tag was registered (e.g. 2015-2).
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: Période (par exemple année et trimestre) lorsque l'étiquette a été enregistrée (par exemple 2015-2).

DESCRIPTION: The date the tag was registered with motus
Type of signal transmitted by the tag (e.g. Beeper or ID).
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: Type de signal émis par l'émetteur (par exemple Beeper ou ID).

DESCRIPTION: If a manufacturer has more than one code set from which a code can come, this must uniquely identify the one for this tag. (e.g. 'Lotek-3')
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: Si un fabricant a plus d'un jeu de codes à partir de laquelle un code peut venir, il faut identifier de manière unique l'un pour cette émetteur. (Par exemple, 'Lotek-3')

DESCRIPTION: Tag manufacturer (eg. Lotek)
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: Fabricant de tag (par exemple Lotek)

DESCRIPTION: Tag model (eg. NTQB-3-2)
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: Modèle du tag (par exemple NTQB-1)

DESCRIPTION: Lifespan of tag (days)

Nominal frequency receiver was tuned to, in Mhz.  This really only applies to SG, where we usually tune 4 kHz below the nominal tag frequency.  So in that case, antFreq = 166.376 while nomFreq = 166.380
Offset frequency, in kHz. This value is measured from the sample recording of the tag.
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: Décalage de fréquence, en kHz. Cette valeur est mesurée à partir de l'enregistrement de l'échantillon de l'émetteur.

DESCRIPTION: Tag repeat period (in seconds). This value is measured from the sample recording of the tag.
Standard deviation of the tag repeat period (in seconds). This value is measured from the sample recording of the tag.
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: L'écart-type de la période de répétition de l'émetteur (en secondes). Cette valeur est mesurée à partir de l'enregistrement échantillon de l'émetteur.

DESCRIPTION: Tag pulse length (in seconds). This value is only assigned based on the sample recording of the tag.
DESCRIPTION_FRENCH: Longueur de l'impulsion de l'émetteur (en secondes). Cette valeur est affectée uniquement sur la base de l'enregistrement échantillon de l'émetteur.

DESCRIPTION: Deployment end date
